CR Securities Position Log Instance Record
column4: The type of securities transaction log (e.g. equities, derivatives, all)

column4: The product/service investment account for which this is the securities transaction log

Securities Position Keeping: CR Securities Position Log Instance Record
column4: Reference to the product or service account holder/customer for the log if appropriate

Securities Position Keeping: CR Securities Position Log Instance Record
column4: Reference to a counterparty for the log if appropriate (e.g. merchant reference, corporate reference)

Securities Position Keeping: CR Securities Position Log Instance Record
column4: Details the range of instruments that are tracked by the log (each instrument has its own transaction record/holding position

Securities Position Keeping: CR Securities Position Log Instance Record
column4: Details for an individual tracked instrument type - (the log track transactions for multiple securities/instruments)

Securities Position Keeping: CR Securities Position Log Instance Record
column4: Reference to the type of investment instrument being tracked (e.g. equity, commodity, FX/MM, derivative)

Securities Position Keeping: CR Securities Position Log Instance Record
column4: The specific instrument trading identifier (e.g. NASDAQ Id)

Securities Position Keeping: CR Securities Position Log Instance Record
column4: Basic position limits that are maintained as an aspect of the log (these can include securities holdings and related instrument properties such as associated dividends entitlements)

Securities Position Keeping: CR Securities Position Log Instance Record
column4: The type of position maintained for the log (e.g. cumulative balance)

Securities Position Keeping: CR Securities Position Log Instance Record
column4: The position definition, associated limit settings and rules

Securities Position Keeping: CR Securities Position Log Instance Record
column4: The current calculated position

Securities Position Keeping: CR Securities Position Log Instance Record
column4: Support for recording blocks on the log position (handling is by the associated investment account fulfillment service domain)

column4: The type of block applied to the tracked securities position (e.g. pending, final)

column4: Priority classification for the block

Securities Position Keeping: CR Securities Position Log Instance Record
column4: The amount of the block

Securities Position Keeping: CR Securities Position Log Instance Record
column4: The type of key dates associated with the block  (e.g. start, expiry)

Securities Position Keeping: CR Securities Position Log Instance Record
column4: Value of the specific date type

Securities Position Keeping: CR Securities Position Log Instance Record
column4: The date and time the log was initiated. Note the log will have a complex internal calendar structure for extract and reporting

column4: The status of the log entry (e.g. active, in-suspense etc.)
